thread.title: BRIEF-Tempur Sealy CEO's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $18 Mln

title: BRIEF-Tempur Sealy CEO's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $18 Mln
text: March 26, 2018 / 12:46 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Tempur Sealy CEO's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $18 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Tempur Sealy International Inc: * TEMPUR SEALY SAYS CHAIRMAN AND CEO SCOTT THOMPSONâ€™S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $18 MILLION VERSUS $6.2 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING * TEMPUR SEALY SAYS CEO SCOTT THOMPSON'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION INCLUDED $8.4 MILLION IN OPTION AWARDS AND $7 MILLION IN STOCK AWARDS Source text ( bit.ly/2pIo3GH ) Further company coverage:
